For India to progress, do we really need smaller states? What has been the performance of small states that were carved out previously from large states? Have they fulfilled the demands of the people or is it just plain power politics at play?

     In India the progress of the country doesn't relies on the geographical limitations of the states. It  purely depends upon the Integrity and ethical levels of the leaders. In current scenario  the economy of the India seems to be in declining stage whereas the actual fact is quite vice verse. Though there are approvals from the central head for the FDI's and as we were experienced the new technology innovations in all the sectors why the country progress limits with the geographical limitations. If the funds from all the divisions are been equally shared based on the  analyst reports (as there might be some states where they've been technically advance and other nor even in Introductory stage).

      If we consider China Being placed in one of the largest population country and Singapore or japan being placed small countries we can observe a tremendous growth in china in all the areas and were being a one of the toughest competitor for all others. In the Case of japan, though it has been badly effected in the major places of Hiroshima and Nagasaki now it's been more advanced in technological part.so growth of the country purely depends on the strategies applied by the leaders of the state.

     Now, In current scenario there are sates which are been carved out from big states such as Chhattisgarh and now recently Telangana .  But when we get in to the commitments given by the politicians to the citizens for carving their areas from the state no such promises had been fulfilled so far, and there are chances of declining the country's growth with such carved states where the leaders have failed to keep up the assured one's. But if the leaders really concentrate on the carved states economy and technological growth surely it would help out for the country growth.

   The central political  Power should have a clear analysis for the requirement of the new states by getting the research done with the specialized analysts team and should have a final decision on it . As now a days most of the citizens are educated and were very clear with strategies played by the politicians most of the people are encouraging the taught of evolution of new states. Ideology of the Political leaders with such proposals should be taken into consideration only if there is a real need exists which effects the growth of  such locations. This should be keenly observed in all the aspects by the central ruling party and should involve the other left parties and should design a research where the team should penetrate completely in the each and every part of the location and should get clear views of the citizens. Based on the research team assesments  and the citizen views central government should come to a final conclusion on the proposals of the leaders. 

  After being carved from the big state, if the political leaders failed to deliver the output as committed the Central government should be answerable to the citizens for failure in the quality outputs. Because such cases  may badly effect the country growth because as the citizens of such small states will again start moving to the developed states  for the employment and also to enhance their skills as the Foreign Direct Investments are mostly preferred in the developed states and very less chances in the newly emerged small states. As now a days Unemployment is the major problem for the country growth , the chances of getting hired should be hiked . This can be possible only when the political leaders starts analysing the need for FDI'S in their states. 

   Political leaders should mainly concentrate in raising the proposals for the central government in tie ups with the corporates  and also starts concentrating in getting the outsourcing deals to their areas from World leaders so that it helps out in improving the Technological part and new skills can be obtained with such Implementation. Apart from this the government should encourage the entrepreneur's by enlighten the public  with new taught. so country progress depends upon the each and every part of the nation's growth simultaneously. India is well strong in the economy part and even in technical part, but still the country growth is lacking only due to the integrity levels of the political parties. So apart from concentrating on the evolution of new states the leaders should first try to identify the areas they are lacking with and should frame the strategies for the growth in such particular areas. 

  " Unity is strength " a famous saying where most of the citizens are aware of this, so before coming to a decision for evolution of new state the local political leaders and citizens should be very clear with the need of the evolution as a new state by assessing in all the ways and finally with a strong proven reason that the evolution  of the new state would surely help for progress of  the particular location in economical part , Technological improvement part, Education levels, water resources, employment resorces and in all other sectors.
